name: Javier López Cacenave
subtitle: Full-Stack Developer
pageNotFoundMsg: Oops! It looks like the page you were looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

aboutShort.hook: I work with people who want to win. Is that you?

aboutLong.headline: Vision + Pragmatism
aboutLong.intro: Driven by innate curiosity and a hands-on approach, I turn complex needs into simple yet effective full-stack software solutions that deliver tangible results.
aboutLong.storyParagraph1: Since childhood, I've been fascinated by technology and the 'how' of things. But my interest doesn't stop at understanding; I constantly ask myself, 'How could this be *better*?'. This duality defines my work: I possess an intuitive ability—influenced by my father's intuition—that allows me to perceive underlying needs and visualize creative solutions, almost like a sixth sense for potential.
aboutLong.storyParagraph2: However, I understand that even the most brilliant ideas are worthless if they aren't practical and communicable—a crucial lesson inherited from my mother's characteristic pragmatism. That's why I always anchor that vision in practicality: seeking tangible results, defining clear steps, and building solutions that people can actually use, here and now. This ability to balance future vision with immediate, real-world utility is central to my approach.
aboutLong.storyMediaAlt2: Visualization of pragmatism or practical application
aboutLong.storyParagraph3: My goal is to merge these two facets: vision and pragmatism.
aboutLong.caseStudyParagraph1: One example is the custom ERP built for Ortoprodent. This dental lab is renowned for the quality of its prosthetics and the skill of its team. However, like many specialized businesses, its administrative management posed significant challenges, consuming valuable time and energy. Anticipating that commercial software would be too complex for their specific needs, I opted for a pragmatic approach, built from scratch. The priority was an exceptionally user-friendly experience (minimal cognitive load), with highly optimized workflows and a clean interface. The result? A tool that not only organizes but truly smooths the friction of management, allowing the team to dedicate all their talent to what they do best: creating exceptional prosthetic work.
aboutLong.caseStudyMediaAlt: Visualization of the dental lab ERP project
aboutLong.approachTitle: My Approach: From Need to Solution
aboutLong.approachStep1Desc: Deep-dive into the core challenge, connecting human needs and business goals with technical feasibility to define the fundamental 'what' and 'why'.
aboutLong.approachStep2Desc: Fuse creative vision with pragmatic design: architect the solution and define the optimal user experience, charting a clear path to the desired outcome.
aboutLong.approachStep3Desc: Bring the solution to life: build functional, robust software that solves the identified challenge, delivering measurable value and improving the experience for everyone involved.

ortoprodentWeb.name: Dental Lab Website
ortoprodentWeb.summary: Corporate website for Ortoprodent, a dental laboratory. Aimed to modernize their online presence, facilitate contact for new clients, and showcase service quality. The project has been very well received, generating praise and new business interest.
details: Full design and development of the responsive corporate website.
Implementation of smooth animations and transitions with Framer Motion for a modern user experience.
SEO and performance optimization using React Helmet Async and Vite.
Integration of contact form and interactive map.

royalTikTok.name: Royal TikTok
royalTikTok.summary: Designed and implemented a data platform to extract, transform, and expose unstructured TikTok LIVE data for talent scouting.
details: Developed advanced scraping solutions (Playwright, BeautifulSoup) and integrated official/private APIs for data acquisition.
Built an ETL pipeline using Pandas for data cleaning, normalization, and dynamic filtering.
Orchestrated the entire process using APScheduler for automated execution.
Exposed curated data through a FastAPI-built RESTful API, enabling multi-output scenarios (e.g., Notion API integration for user-facing lists).
Focused on a modular, reusable design applicable to other domains with chaotic data.
Key results included a 20-30% increase in client's monthly revenue and significantly faster talent acquisition.
royalTikTok.mediaAlt1: Visual representation of the data pipeline or results for Royal TikTok

ortoprodent.name: Dental Lab ERP
ortoprodent.summary: Developed a custom ERP software solution for a dental laboratory, significantly improving their organization and workflow.
details: Built a bespoke software application from scratch to manage all lab processes.
Focused obsessively on ease-of-use (minimal cognitive load UX) and convenience for a non-technical user.
Met all specified requirements and designed for future extensibility.
Resulted in radical efficiency gains and high user satisfaction (see testimonial).
ortoprodent.mediaAlt1: Screenshot or mockup of the Ortoprodent ERP interface

teldat.summary: Contributed as a Full-Stack Developer to 'XDR/be.Analyzer', a complex multi-tenant network monitoring and analytics platform.
teldat.projectContextPurposeDesc: A comprehensive, multi-tenant platform designed for network device management, real-time traffic analysis (handling NetFlow, sFlow, etc.), telemetry visualization via customizable dashboards, network asset management, and hierarchical user/permission management. Features included licensing controls and potential AI-driven anomaly detection.
teldat.projectContextArchDesc: Multi-layered architecture featuring a Django/DRF REST API backend, PostgreSQL for relational metadata (users, devices, configs), Apache Druid for time-series telemetry data storage and querying, Redis for caching and as a Celery message broker, and Celery for asynchronous task execution. Designed for containerized deployment (Docker), targeting cloud environments (GCP).
projectContextModules: Dashboards & Reporting (Customizable Widgets, PDF Export, Alarms)
details: Developed and maintained backend REST API services using Python, Django, and Django Rest Framework (DRF) with PostgreSQL for core platform functionalities like user management, device configuration, and data retrieval within the 'be.Analyzer' system.
Utilized Celery for handling asynchronous background tasks such as periodic report generation, alarm processing, and license validation.
Leveraged Redis for API response caching and as a message broker for Celery.
Integrated with Kafka for consuming or producing event streams related to network data or system events.
Worked with Apache Druid, focusing on querying and retrieving large volumes of time-series network telemetry data to support the platform's traffic analysis features.
Implemented and maintained API documentation using SwaggerUI (via drf-yasg) for clarity and ease of integration.
Configured and used Honeybadger for real-time error monitoring and alerting in backend services.
Wrote unit and integration tests using Pytest and related libraries (e.g., factory-boy) to ensure code quality and reliability.
Managed application development and deployment environments using Docker containers.
Contributed significantly to reducing technical debt and improving the maintainability of the legacy React frontend system, which was inherited from previous external development efforts.

driveMeGroup.summary: Enhanced an ETL process and reporting system to consolidate leads, compare vehicle prices, and enable dynamic pricing for a used car rental group.
details: Integrated data from various sources: third-party car websites (via scraping/API RE), Call Center leads, and website vehicle inquiries.
Integrated Twilio API to enable Call Center functionalities.
Utilized Zoho Dataprep for data transformation and cleaning.
Leveraged Zoho Analytics for creating dashboards, generating insights, and presenting data storytelling for management.
Implemented API integrations and reverse-engineered APIs where necessary.
Improved logic for dynamic vehicle outsourcing: checking third-party cost/availability and applying a margin/cost-based pricing algorithm if a requested vehicle wasn't in the fleet.
driveMeGroup.mediaAlt1: Example Zoho Analytics dashboard or data flow diagram for Drive Me Group

grindrPlus.title: Grindr Plus
grindrPlus.summary: An Xposed module for Android exploring premium features of the Grindr dating app.
details: Performed static and dynamic analysis of the obfuscated Android application (Kotlin/Java).
Utilized Xposed Framework for runtime hooking and modification.
Intercepted and analyzed network traffic (using tools like Burp Suite) to understand private API interactions.
Successfully enabled certain premium features locally for educational purposes.
Demonstrates practical application of reverse engineering techniques on mobile platforms.
Driven by curiosity and the challenge of understanding closed-source systems.
grindrPlus.mediaAlt1: Conceptual image related to Grindr Plus modding/RE

csosBeacon.title: Cobalt Strike Open Source Beacon
csosBeacon.summary: Developed a functional open-source C2 beacon inspired by Cobalt Strike, built from scratch in C.
details: Researched Command and Control (C2) communication patterns and techniques.
Implemented core beacon functionality, including check-ins and task retrieval.
Developed communication channels over HTTP, TCP, and SMB (via Named Pipes).
Interfaced directly with the Win32 API for system-level operations.
Included basic Powershell execution capabilities for simulated post-exploitation tasks.
Motivated by a deep interest in cybersecurity, malware analysis, and low-level systems programming.
csosBeacon.mediaAlt1: Diagram or code snippet related to the CSOS Beacon project

idealistillo.title: Idealistillo
idealistillo.summary: Developed 'Idealistillo', a Python client library wrapping the Idealista API for property data.
details: Provides a simple, intuitive Python interface for interacting with Idealista's property data API (official or otherwise).
Handles authentication, pagination, and endpoint abstraction.
Simplifies data retrieval for personal analysis or integration into other projects.

santiago.quote: Working with Javier was a game-changer for our agency. From day one, he understood our needs and completely transformed our TikTok LIVE recruitment system, automating manual processes and significantly improving our efficiency. Within a few months, we achieved a 20-30% increase in monthly revenue thanks to faster and more accurate talent acquisition.

elena.quote: I'm super organized since they set up this program for me, it's super easy and super convenient, I have everything I need. And on top of that, they told me that anything I think of, they'll put it in the program. I'm super happy, I recommend it 100%.

ipo.title: International Philosophy Olympiad (IPO)
ipo.summary: Represented Spain in the XXVII International Competition held in Rome, reaching the semi-finals following national selection.
skills: Advanced English (Oral and written defense of complex philosophical arguments)
ipo.mediaAlt1: Photo from the IPO 2019 event or related materials

oif.title: Ibero-American Philosophy Olympiad
oif.summary: Achieved Bronze Medal in the national qualifying stage of the Ibero-American competition.

ncl.title: III National Cyberleague
ncl.summary: Reached the semi-finals in the technical category of the III National Cyberleague as part of a multidisciplinary team.
ncl.mediaAlt1: Image related to the National Cyber League event or team

hackaboss.summary: Intensive bootcamp focusing on practical Data Science and AI skills, providing a strong foundation for subsequent data-centric roles.
hackaboss.description: Covered the full data science lifecycle, from data acquisition and processing to machine learning modeling and deployment fundamentals.

unex.summary: Completed ~3 years towards Software Engineering degree.
unex.notes: Driven by strong intellectual curiosity and a focus on practical application, I decided to pivot my career towards the professional sphere. I seek an environment that allows me to develop my potential and generate value more agilely and directly. This decision stems from my desire to complement theory with real-world experience and find a space where I can accelerate my growth and contribute more immediately and effectively to tangible projects.

footer.cta: Ready to win — or just exploring?
